data.name: HeroTitle
data.value:
Delicious Food,
Delivered To Your Door

data.name: HeroSubtitle
data.value: Experience the best local delivery service. Fresh, hot, and fast.

data.name: Feature1Desc
data.value: We promise to deliver your food within 30 minutes or it's free.

data.name: Feature2Desc
data.value: We work with the best local farms to ensure high quality.

data.name: Feature3Desc
data.value: Our team is always here to help you with any questions.
